name: TonpaQuest
description:
TonpaQuest is an in-depth Tonpa Experience unlike any other.

Set 2 months after Tender Love and Care: A Leorio Dating Sim, you play as Tonpa, who is about to get fired. He has 3 days to persuade a senior staff member to write him a letter of recommendation.

  • 11 endings.
  • Over 2x as long as TLAC.
  • 50 minutes to an hour playtime.
  • Appearances from fan-favorite characters.

Made by Emily and Sally.
